channel.title: 多线程 on 打工人日记
channel.description: Recent content in 多线程 on 打工人日记

item.title: java创建线程的7种方式
item.description: java创建线程的7种方式 继承Thread类并重写run()方法 public class MyThread extends Thread { @Override public void run() { System.out.println(this.getId()+this.getName()+ " is running"); } public static void main(String[] arg){ new MyThread().start(); new MyThread().start(); new MyThread().start(); new MyThread().start(); } } $ "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_171\bin\java.exe" 12Thread-0 is running 15Thread-3 is running 13Thread-1 is running 14Thread-2 is running Process finished with exit code 0 实现Runnable接口 public class MyThread implements Runnable{ @Override public void run() { System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName()+" is running"); } public static void main(String[] args){ new Thread(new MyThread()).
